AND
3 & 1 = 1
-1 & 10 = 10
-2 & 13 = 12
16 & 8 = 0
12 & 14 = 12
-1 & -1 = 4294967295
OR
3 | 1 = 3
-1 | 10 = 4294967295
-2 | 13 = 4294967295
16 | 8 = 24
12 | 14 = 14
-1 | -1 = 4294967295
XOR
3 ^ 1 = 2
-1 ^ 10 = 4294967285
-2 ^ 13 = 4294967283
16 ^ 8 = 24
12 ^ 14 = 2
-1 ^ -1 = 0
NOT
~1 = 4294967294
~-1 = 0
~0 = 4294967295
~3 = 4294967292
SHIFT
2 >> 1 = 1
2 << 1 = 4
1 << 3 = 8
100 >> 3 = 12
-1 >> 0 = 4294967295
-1 >> 1 = 2147483647
-1 >> 30 = 3
-1 << 0 = 4294967295
-1 << 1 = 4294967294
-1 << 31 = 2147483648
